task.summary: Basic project setup for IntelliJ, maven, and SBT.
Added Eclipse support and fixed up the pom a bit.
Minor fixes and added system detection.
Fixed up Java API a bit.
Small step towards stream-based argument parsing.
Initial steps towards GNU-style argument parsing.
More steps towards GNU-style parsing compliance.
Minor refactoring in order to use more correct terminology.
Add option parser based on java.io.File.
Minor setup and reminder to later use macros for creating objects that represent the options.

MESSAGE.value: Added Eclipse support and fixed up the pom a bit.

Fixed up Java API a bit.

Add option parser based on java.io.File.
Minor setup and reminder to later use macros for creating objects that represent the options.
